Uses of Package
com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core

Packages that use com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core
com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core   
com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.event   
 

Classes in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core used by com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core
Action
          This interfaces denotes a procedure that may be executed as part of processing a state transition.
Entity
          Denotes an entity whose state is managed using the state transition machine.
Event
          Denotes an event that may be delivered to a finite state machine.
FiniteStateException
          Denotes an exception generated by an error in finite state machine processing, such as a missing transition.
Guard
          Denotes a class used to determine whether the conditions for a workflow transition have been met.
State
          Denotes a state in a finite state machine.
StateChangeListener
          Call-back interface to allow state machine client code to listen for state changes easily.
StateTransitionLatch
          Implements a latch that waits for a state machine reach a specified state or optionally the error state.
StateTransitionMap
          Manages the map of states and transitions composing a finite state machine.
StateType
          Enumerates the types of states permitted in a state transition diagram.
Transition
          Defines a transition between two states with an accompanying guard that determines when the transition can be applied.
TransitionFailureException
          Denotes a completely failed transition.
TransitionMatcher
          Matches transitions against a particular event.
TransitionRollbackException
          Denotes a failed transition that can be rolled back to the previous state.
 

Classes in com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core used by com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.event
Event
          Denotes an event that may be delivered to a finite state machine.
StateMachine
          Implements a finite state machine.
